command_line: mkdir -p circos/conf/ circos/data/ &&  ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/c/6/0/dataset_c600b283-c9e6-42a8-8812-98bd22db6a42.dat' genomeref.fa &&  python '/cvmfs/cloud.galaxyproject.org/tools/toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/circos/df7356989ac1/circos/karyotype-from-fasta.py' genomeref.fa > circos/conf/karyotype.txt &&  python '/cvmfs/cloud.galaxyproject.org/tools/toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/circos/df7356989ac1/circos/karyotype-colors.py' `grep -c '^chr\s' 'circos/conf/karyotype.txt'` > 'circos/conf/karyotype-colors.conf' &&  touch circos/conf/karyotype-colors.conf &&    cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/20/configs/tmpib068xt3' circos/conf/circos.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/20/configs/tmpryc_12ru' circos/conf/ticks.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/20/configs/tmps1li0f66' circos/conf/ideogram.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/20/configs/tmphmgxdw9w'  circos/conf/data.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/20/configs/tmp28png33t'  circos/conf/links.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/20/configs/tmp2ir5opbq' circos/conf/galaxy_test_case.json &&  cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/a/0/5/dataset_a056f752-c0ca-4a2f-981a-b0611e9cfcd7.dat' circos/data/data-0.txt && cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/a/0/5/dataset_a056f752-c0ca-4a2f-981a-b0611e9cfcd7.dat' circos/data/data-1.txt && cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/0/5/0/dataset_05080d07-0f7c-492f-a7c5-a08c1e48e982.dat' circos/data/data-2.txt &&  cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/3/6/2/dataset_3622678b-fe5f-4506-8036-5682e3511501.dat' circos/data/links-0.txt &&   circos -conf circos/conf/circos.conf -noparanoid

params.ideogram: {"angle_offset": "-90", "angle_orientation": "clockwise", "bands": {"band_stroke_color": "#000000", "band_stroke_thickness": "0", "band_transparency": "3", "fill_bands": true, "show_bands": true}, "chromosomes_reverse": null, "ideogram_labels": {"parallel": true, "radius_offset": "0.075", "show_label": true, "size": "24"}, "limit_chromosomes": null, "pairwise_spacing": [], "radius": "0.9", "spacing": "0.5", "thickness": "30.0", "units": "kb"}
